寸毫: (すんごう) - a bit; very little
寸法: (sunpou) - medida, tamanho, extensão, dimensão; plano, intenção, arranjo, cronograma
寸胴: (ずんど) - cylindrical container (pot, vase, etc.); having no waist (straight body figure, not curvy)/being stumpy; sleeveless (coat etc.)
寸言: (すんげん) - pithy or short and witty remark; wisecrack
寸評: (すんぴょう) - brief review; thumbnail sketch
寸詰まり: (すんづまり) - a little short; sawed-off (pants)
寸足らず: (すんたらず) - a little too short
寸進尺退: (すんしんしゃくたい) - (yoji) one step forward, many steps backward; little to gain and much to lose
寸鉄: (すんてつ) - short blade/small weapon; epigram/pithy saying
寸鉄人を刺す: (すんてつひとをさす) - to make a cutting remark; to stab someone with a short blade
寸鉄人を殺す: (すんてつひとをころす) - to make a cutting remark; to kill someone with a short blade
寸隙: (すんげき) - spare time/spare moment; small opening/small crack
寺中: (じちゅう) - in a temple/inside temple grounds; sub-temple
寺入り: (てらいり) - to enrol in a temple school/child enrolled in a temple school; incarcerating a criminal in a temple as a form of punishment (popular during the latter Muromachi and Azuchi-Momoyama periods); to go to a temple and repent (following a disaster, etc.)
寺内町: (じないまち) - town built within the semi-fortified compounds of a temple (during the Warring States period)
寺務: (じむ) - temple affairs; temple administrator/person in charge of temple affairs
寺務所: (じむしょ) - office of a temple
寺参り: (てらまいり) - ritual visits to a temple
寺子: (てらこ) - child who attended a temple school
寺子屋: (てらこや) - temple elementary school (during the Edo period)
寺小屋: (てらこや) - temple elementary school (during the Edo period)
寺格: (じかく) - status of a Buddhist temple
寺檀制度: (じだんせいど) - system used during the Edo era where commoners had to register with a temple in order to prove their Buddhist faith
寺男: (てらおとこ) - male temple employee (esp. one who does odd jobs)
寺社奉行: (じしゃぶぎょう) - governmental position of the shogunate, responsible for the management of temples and shrines
寺請: (てらうけ) - certification issued by a temple to prove affiliation
寺請け: (てらうけ) - certification issued by a temple to prove affiliation
寺請制度: (てらうけせいど) - system used during the Edo era where commoners had to register with a temple in order to prove their Buddhist faith
寺銭: (てらせん) - banker's cut or fee charged in a gambling saloon
寺院: (jiin) - Templo budista; edifício religioso, igreja, catedral, mesquita
寺預け: (てらあずけ) - incarcerating a criminal in a temple as a form of punishment (popular during the latter Muromachi and Azuchi-Momoyama periods)
寺領: (じりょう) - temple's territory; temple's estate
対々和: (トイトイホー) - {mahj} all pungs (chi:); winning hand consisting of four pungs or kongs and one pair
対い: (むかい) - facing; opposite; across the street; other side
対う: (むかう) - to face; to go towards
対して: (たいして) - for; in regard to; per
対す: (ついす) - to form a pair; to correspond
対する: (たいする) - to face (each other)/to be facing; to be directed toward (the future, etc.)/to be in response to/to be related to; to receive (a client, etc.); to compare with/to contrast with/to be in opposition with/to be opposed to; to confront/to oppose/to compete with
対になる: (ついになる) - to form a pair; to pair up
対の屋: (たいのや) - side house (to the east, west, or north of a main residence; home to women, children and servants)
対をなす: (ついをなす) - to act as an opposite; to form a counterpart; act as a twin
対を成す: (ついをなす) - to act as an opposite; to form a counterpart; act as a twin
対テロ作戦: (たいテロさくせん) - antiterrorist operation; counterterrorism operation
対テロ戦争: (たいテロせんそう) - War on Terror
対世効: (たいせいこう) - binding legal effectiveness as to third parties
対中国関係: (たいちゅうごくかんけい) - relations with China
対中戦略: (たいちゅうせんりゃく) - strategy for dealing with China
対人地雷: (たいじんじらい) - anti-personnel land mine
対人恐怖症: (たいじんきょうふしょう) - anthropophobia
対人感覚: (たいじんかんかく) - (yoji) feelings toward other people; sensitivity to other people's feelings; feelings one gives to other people through interpersonal relationships
対人関係: (たいじんかんけい) - (yoji) personal relations
対価型セクハラ: (たいかがたセクハラ) - quid pro quo sexual harassment
対共産圏輸出統制委員会: (たいきょうさんけんゆしゅつとうせいいいんかい) - Coordination Committee on Multilateral Export Controls
対処法: (たいしょほう) - coping method; approach; how to deal with (problem, etc.)
対前年比: (たいぜんねんひ) - relative change from last year
対向: (たいこう) - counter-; corresponding; face; opposite
対向車: (たいこうしゃ) - car (running) on the opposite lane; oncoming car
対向車線: (たいこうしゃせん) - opposite lane; oncoming lane; opposite side of the road
対地同期軌道: (たいちどうききどう) - {astron} geosynchronous orbit
対地攻撃: (たいちこうげき) - ground attack; air-raid
対外取引: (たいがいとりひき) - overseas transactions; foreign transactions
対外政策: (たいがいせいさく) - foreign policy
対外政策に沿って: (たいがいせいさくにそって) - in line with the foreign policy
対外純資産: (たいがいじゅんしさん) - net external assets
対外資産負債残高: (たいがいしさんふさいざんだか) - net international investment position
対外関係: (たいがいかんけい) - (yoji) foreign (international) relations; diplomacy; external affairs
